sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Grid, Card, CardContent, TextField, Button, Box, Paper, Divider } from '@mui/material'; import { LocationOn, Phone, Email, AccessTime, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { ContactBackground } from '../components/BackgroundStyles'; const EnhancedContact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', category: 'general' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Message sent! We will respond within 24 hours.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '', category: 'general' }); }; const contactMethods = [ { icon: , title: 'Phone Numbers', details: [ 'Main Office: +94 91 2245765', 'Canteen Direct: +94 77 1234567', 'Emergency: +94 91 2245700' ] }, { icon: , title: 'Email Addresses', details: [ 'General: canteen@tech.ruh.ac.lk', 'Feedback: feedback@tech.ruh.ac.lk', 'Orders: orders@tech.ruh.ac.lk' ] }, { icon: , title: 'WhatsApp Support', details: [ 'Quick Orders: +94 77 1234567', 'Complaints: +94 77 1234568', 'Available: 7:00 AM - 8:00 PM' ] } ]; return ( {/* Header */} Contact University of Ruhuna Canteen We're here to serve you better. Get in touch with us! {/* Contact Methods */} {contactMethods.map((method, index) => ( {method.icon} {method.title} {method.details.map((detail, idx) => ( {detail} ))} ))} {/* Contact Form */} Send us a Message Have a question, suggestion, or complaint? We'd love to hear from you!
setFormData({...formData, name: e.target.value})} /> setFormData({...formData, email: e.target.value})} /> setFormData({...formData, category: e.target.value})} SelectProps={{ native: true }} > setFormData({...formData, subject: e.target.value})} /> setFormData({...formData, message: e.target.value})} />
{/* Location & Details */} Visit Our Location {/* Map Placeholder */} University of Ruhuna Campus Map Hapugala, Galle - Interactive map coming soon {/* Address Details */} Address Faculty of Technology
University of Ruhuna
Hapugala, Galle 80000
Southern Province, Sri Lanka Operating Hours Monday - Friday:
Breakfast: 7:00 AM - 9:00 AM
Lunch: 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM
Dinner: 6:00 PM - 8:00 PM
Stationery: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Saturday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Sunday: Closed
Public Holidays: 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM {/* Social Media */} Follow Us {/* Quick Contact Info */} 🚨 Emergency Contact Information Food Poisoning Emergency Call immediately: +94 91 2245700
Available 24/7 Lost & Found Security Office: +94 91 2245701
Mon-Fri: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM Urgent Complaints WhatsApp: +94 77 1234568
Response within 30 minutes {/* FAQ Section */} Frequently Asked Questions 🍽️ Can I cancel my order? Yes, you can cancel orders up to 15 minutes before pickup time through the app or by calling us. 💳 What payment methods do you accept? We accept cash, digital payments, university meal cards, and online banking transfers. 🕒 Can I order outside operating hours? You can place advance orders through the app 24/7, but pickup is only during operating hours. 🌶️ Do you cater to dietary restrictions? Yes! We offer vegetarian, vegan, and halal options. Please mention your requirements when ordering. ); }; export default EnhancedContact;
